About Occurrence

Umbrella to hold all occurrence related work

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Occurrence :: CLI Umbrella to hold all occurrence related work
Occurrence :: Common Common objects for the Occurrence module that don't belong in the API
Occurrence :: Deleter Takes messages requesting deletion of single occurrence or entire datasets and acts on them.
Occurrence :: Index Builder Umbrella to hold all occurrence related work
Occurrence Index Builder :: Oozie workflow Umbrella to hold all occurrence related work
Occurrence :: Interpreters Interpretation libraries for getting from verbatim occurrences to interpreted occurrences
Occurrence :: Persistence Persistence pieces for the Occurrence project
Occurrence :: Parser Parser that accepts streams of occurrence records as provided by publishers. In XML, using any of these schemas: DWC 1.0, DWC 1.4, ABCD 1.2, ABCD 2.06. It also handles DwCA
Occurrence :: Processor Takes xml/json occurrence fragments and persists them to HBase, then processes and interprets them.
Occurrence :: Search service Umbrella to hold all occurrence related work
Occurrence :: Web service Umbrella to hold all occurrence related work
Occurrence :: Web service client Umbrella to hold all occurrence related work
Occurrence Download :: Common Common code shared between the workflow modules
Occurrence Download :: Web service Web service to download occurrences
Occurrence Download :: Web service client Provides a convenient client for the Occurrence Download Web service
Occurrence Download :: Oozie Workflow Oozie Workflow backing the Occurrence Download Service
